name: Stickman Travel Quest - Puzzle Adventure Game
name_original: Stickman Travel Quest - Puzzle Adventure Game
description:
'Stickman Travel Quest'is a funny point and click puzzle adventure game for everyone.

This time,our Mr stickman has won a free trip around the world.He will have his trip now.
But the bad man,Troll,want to ruin stickman's vacation when he got the message.
Help the stickman have a fun trip!
Show your puzzle skills to solve the puzzles of each level without any clear instructions.

It's not easy,find all hidden different objects or characters,click the correct objects in order to complete all puzzles.

Enjoy!
